service.name: Massage Therapy

seo.title: Massage Therapy in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Relaxation and recovery, tailored to you. Choice, Deep Tissue, and Thai modalities with optional Hot Stone, Cupping, or Gua Sha add-ons.

overview.p1: Reset tight muscles, ease stress, and move better with a massage tailored to your body and day.
overview.p2: Choose your focus areas and preferred pressure—then add Hot Stone, Cupping, or Gua Sha for next-level relief.

whyReluxe.title: Skilled modalities
whyReluxe.body: From relaxing to therapeutic, we match technique to your needs.

whyReluxe.title: Custom focus
whyReluxe.body: You pick the areas; we handle the knots.

whyReluxe.title: Thoughtful add-ons
whyReluxe.body: Enhancements that truly complement—not distract from—your session.

service.tagline: Relaxation and recovery, tailored to you.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: Your session, your way—pressure, focus areas, and add-ons are customizable.

items.heading: Therapist expertise
items.body: Multiple modalities to match your needs.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
